string.value: The portal has now opened. Press the up arrow key at the portal to enter.

Ola Ola consists of 3 levels of stage, and there's only one portal that'll take you to the next level. Other portals are either not open, or will take you to a strange place, so you need to be careful choosing the right portal.
Please remember the fake portals; that way you won't have to go through it again. Good luck!
Everyone that clears Ola Ola on time wil be given an item, regardless of the order of finish, so just relax, take your time, and select the correct portals.
The number of portals will increase as you move up the level.
We're halfway through the time-limit. Please carefully choose the correct portal.
You have 2 minutes left. If you're on level 1, then please hurry!!
One minute. 1 minute
You have 10 sec. left. Those of you unable to beat the game, we hope you beat it next time! Great job, everyone!! See you later~
The portal has now opened. Press the up arrow key at the portal to enter.
[MapleStory Physical Fitness Test] consists of 4 stages, and if you happen to die during the game, you'll be eliminated from the game, so please be careful of that.
There may be a heavy lag due to many users being at stage 1 all at once. It won't be difficult, so please make sure not to fall down because of heavy lag.
Everyone that clears [The Maple Physical Fitness Test] on time will be given an item, regardless of the order of finish, so just relax, take your time, and clear the four stages.
Please remember that if you die during the event, you'll be eliminated from the game. You still have plenty of time left, so either take a potion or recover HP first before moving on.
The 2nd stage offers monkeys throwing bananas. Please make sure to avoid them by moving along at just the right timing.
The most important thing you'll need to know to avoid the bananas thrown by the monkeys is "Timing." Timing is everything in this!
Please remember that if you die during the event, you'll be eliminated from the game. If you're running out of HP, either take a potion or recover HP first before moving on.
For those of you with heavy lags, please make sure to move slowly to avoid falling all the way down because of lags.
The 3rd stage offers traps where you may see them, but you won't be able step on them. Please be careful of them as you make your way up.
The 4th stage is the last one for [The Maple Physical Fitness Test]. Please don't give up at the last minute and try your best. The reward is waiting for you at the very top!
Alright, you don't have much time remaining. Please hurry up a little!
You have 10 sec. left. Those of you unable to beat the game, we hope you beat it next time! Great job, everyone!! See you later~
The Event has been started! You may start hitting on the snowball or the snowman now.
Please remember that if you die during the event, you'll be eliminated from the game. You still have plenty of time left, so either take a potion or recover HP first before moving on.
Your attack will not work if you keep attacking while staying at one place. You'll have to move little by little while attacking the snowman or the snowball.
This is the game where overtaking the lead is very much possible. Please don’t give up now!
You'll return to the starting point once touched by the snowball, so please be careful while attacking.
Please beware of the thorns on the ground while attacking the snowball.
You'll be able to disrupt your opponent's snowball once you attack the snowman/
Your HP will decrease if touched by the snowman, so please be careful while attacking.
Please remember that if you die during the event, you'll be eliminated from the game. You still have plenty of time left, so either take a potion or recover HP first before moving on.
If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!
The huge thorns near the finish line pops up from the ground and takes away a huge chunk of HP, so please beware of it while rolling the snowball.
Your attack will not work if you keep attacking while staying at one place. You'll have to move little by little while attacking the snowman or the snowball.
You'll return to the starting point once touched by the snowball, so please be careful while attacking.
You have 3 minutes left. Please don't give up!
If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!
You have 1 min. left. If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!
The portal is now open. Please enter.
The time limit for the Treasure Hunt has passed. The event has ended, and you'll be sent to a different map. Thank you for participating in this event!

Hi, my name is Eak, the Chamberlain of the Goddess. Don't be alarmed; you won't be able to see me right now. Back when the Goddess turned into a block of stone, I simultaneously lost my own power. If you gather up the power of the Magic Cloud of Orbis, however, then I'll be able to recover my body and re-transform back to my original self. Please collect 20 Magic Clouds and bring them back to me. Right now, you'll only see me as a tiny, flickering light.
The Pirate Ship is about to take off. Please defeat all the monsters within the time limit and hop on the ship.
Time's running out. Quickly dispatch all the monsters and hop on the Pirate Ship.
Guon is searching for fellow travelers.
Time's running out. Quickly complete your mission and move on to the next spot.
The enraged pirates are looking for strangers intruding the ship. You'll need to defeat all the pirates and run through the deck.
Time's running out. Quickly dispatch all the monsters and move on to the next spot.
The disciples of Lord pirate have arrived, all of them very adept at hiding.
Time's running out. Please leave this place immediately.
The enraged pirates are looking for strangers intruding the ship. You'll need to defeat all the pirates and run through the deck.
Time's running out. Quickly dispatch all the monsters and move on to the next spot.
The disciples of Lord pirate have arrived, all of them very adept at hiding.
Time's running out. Please leave this place immediately.
Find the key and lock the door of the deck so the pirates won't be able to escape the place.
Time's running out. Quickly dispatch all the monsters and move on to the next spot.
The intimidating presence of the captian of the Pirate Ship, Lord Pirate, can be seen from afar.
Time's running out. Quickly dispatch all the monsters and move on to the next spot.
게임이 시작되었습니다. 눈덩이나 눈사람을 공격해 주세요.
한 자리에서만 공격을 하면 눈덩이가 굴러가지 않습니다. 조금씩 이동하면서 공격해주세요.
눈사람을 공격하면 상대편의 눈덩이가 굴러가는 것을 방해할 수 있습니다.
눈덩이에 닿으면 3초간 공격과 이동이 되지 않습니다. 닿지 않게 조심하세요.
눈사람에 닿으면 HP가 감소하니 조심해서 공격해 주세요.
캐릭터가 죽게되면 탈락이니 죽지 않게 조심하세요. 물약을 드시거나 HP를 회복한 뒤에 게임에 임해주세요.
눈사람을 공격하면 상대편의 눈덩이가 굴러가는 것을 방해하실 수 있습니다.
제한시간이 지나도 골인하는 팀이 없을 경우 눈덩이를 더 멀리 굴린 팀이 승리하게 되니 끝까지 포기하지 마세요.
3 지점부터는 땅속에 숨었다 공격하는 왕가시가 HP를 많이 감소시키니 잘 피하면서 공격하세요.
눈덩이 굴리기는 역전이 충분히 가능한 게임입니다. 끝까지 포기하지 마세요.
게임 제한시간이 약 3분 남았습니다. 좀 더 힘을 내주세요.
제한시간이 다 지나도 골인하는 팀이 없을 경우에는 눈덩이를 조금이라도 멀리 굴린 팀이 승리하게 되니 끝까지 포기하지 마세요.
게임 제한시간이 약 1분 남았습니다. 좀 더 힘을 내주세요.
게임 제한시간이 약 10초 남았습니다.
승리하지 못하신 분들은 다음 이벤트에서는 꼭 승리하시길 바랍니다. 모두 수고 많으셨습니다.
눈덩이 굴리기 이벤트가 종료 되었습니다. 다음 맵으로 이동됩니다. 잠시만 기다려주세요.
게임이 시작되었습니다. 눈덩이나 눈사람을 공격해 주세요.
한 자리에서만 공격을 하면 눈덩이가 굴러가지 않습니다. 조금씩 이동하면서 공격해주세요.

게임 제한시간이 약 10초 남았습니다.

Please protect Tylus.
You have alomost reached the destination. Please exit by the portal within the time left.
Please protect the pig from the aliens!
Aramia from Henesys park will shoot up the firecrackers soon!
Who's going crazy with the fireworks?
You will receive invitations from other parties for the next 3 minutes.
The team that earns more Carnival Points (CP) in 10 minutes by defeating monsters will win the match.
You may select "Summon Monsters", "Skill", or "Protector" as your tactic during the Monster Carnival. Use Tab and F1~F12 for quicker access!
When in the Monster Carnival, you will not lose EXP upon death.
You will receive invitations from other parties for the next 3 minutes.
